title: Weir Farm National Historic Site: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth        A Ranger leads a group of enthusiastic students down to Weir Pond. National Park Service, Weir Farm National Historic Site            Junior Ranger Become an official Weir Farm National Historic Site Junior Ranger! We also have special Junior Ranger badges if you are a Girl Scout or Boy Scout. Or, become a Web Ranger! The National Park Service has a great Junior Ranger program for kids of all ages on-line.           Youth Programs Learn about Weir Farm National Historic Site's innovative youth programs! From Girl Scouts of Connecticut to our partnerships with Groundwork Bridgeport and Woodcock Nature Center, we strive to enhance the awareness of the next generation to the cultural and natural resources here at Weir Farm NHS.
